thread.title: Israel requests urgent UN investigation for UNRWA involvement on Oct. 7
thread.title_full: Israel requests urgent UN investigation for UNRWA involvement on Oct. 7

author: JERUSALEM POST STAFF
title: Israel requests urgent UN investigation for UNRWA involvement on Oct. 7
text: Israel has requested urgent clarification from senior UN officials regarding UNWRA employee involvement in the October 7 Hamas attack, the IDF announced on Thursday evening.The IDF also called for an"urgent investigation" into the UNWRA employees. ;console.log("2390 BODY2.
